entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
RAIN SHOWERS
SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

CLOUDY
SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 60 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
